text.section: The purpose of the Fund is to promote and assist community-based initiatives in qualified project areas consistent with the purpose of this title.
The State Treasurer shall hold the Fund separately, and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

section.section: Contributions to the Fund under paragraph (1)(iv) of this subsection shall be separately accounted for in the Fund so that the revenue derived from a development in a particular qualified project area shall return to a qualified recipient in that qualified project area.

Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, the Comptroller shall:
pay money in the Fund in annual installments to the Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City; and
ensure that the money in the Fund is distributed in the manner that best accomplishes the purpose of the Fund under this title.
